title: OpenSSH Container Login
description: The script distributed in this repository is used in conjunction with the OpenSSH sshd daemon to launch a Linux container for each ssh login from a client. This containerizes the environment of user sessions by default. Users may specify an environment variable APPTAINER_CONTAINER before executing ssh login in order to select a specific container on the login node.
